lines.text: Well, how could you? I've changed my hair...

[Julia's flashback during surgery]
You're such a good cuddler. The perfect fit.
You still haven't let go, have you Jack? She's dead.
You've gotta understand, I'm just a grease-monkey.
This body remembered. I don't understand it either.
I'm not even allowed to love who I want anymore, am I?
Who do you want to love?
Well, not only do you have an excellent bedside manner, but you saved my life!
Think like a Doctor, you've been around them long enough.
It's because I'm dependent on you. So make me independent, please?
Okay, Don sat by you, stayed up, worried. Now it's your turn.
